thread.title: Honor Magic first impressions: sexy, curvy, and magical [Video]
thread.title_full: Honor Magic first impressions: sexy, curvy, and magical [Video]

title: Honor Magic first impressions: sexy, curvy, and magical [Video]
text: March 7, 2017 “The Honor Magic is possibly the sexiest phone we’ve ever seen” At the Mobile World Congress this year, the newly launched P10 and the P10   smartphones were the shining beacons for Huawei. However, if you had to ask us, the Honor Magic – showcased in December last year – looked more attractive and felt more futuristic. With its curved pebble-shaped glass body and sexy contours, the Magic blurs the edges between the front and the rear part of the phone. Just like Xiaomi’s Mi Mix , the Magic also feels more like a concept phone that has come to life for the retail world to see. The Honor Magic is more than just its looks though. It also offers software that uses artificial intelligence to study your usage patterns and modify the operating system accordingly. The phone also comes with dual camera lenses. To know more about what we think about the Honor Magic, watch the first impressions video. Facebook Comments
